name: Hpi_contact_usage
title: OrgFac Contact Usage
description: A coded type for organisation/facility contact usage.

concept.definition: A general business contact for the organisation.
This contact point is no longer in use (or was never correct, but retained for records).
A general emergency contact for the organisation.
The HealthLink address number used for messaging through HealthLink  (To be retired).
A personal contact for the practitioner or health worker.
A temporary contact point. The period can provide more detailed information.

purpose: A coded type for organisation/facility contact usage.
